name: Pyramid Defense
description:
Pyramid Defense is a 3D tower defense game. Grave robberies' army will rush to the pyramid from all directions to seize the Pharaoh's coffin. You will play the guard of the pyramid, sniping at the bandits with various weapons.

Features

Enemies
There will be a variety of enemies in the game, each of which has its own characteristics and needs to be dealt with by different strategies.
arms
Bombs, logs and fireballs all have different effects, or different weapons are used together, which will produce wonderful reactions.
Levels
At present, there are four levels each with a unique pyramid.
